_README.purpose: Provide a single source of truth for UI selectors to prevent test flakiness caused by volatile Tailwind classes or DOM changes.
_README.strategy: Use stable attributes (data-cy, id, name) where possible. Map UI components to logical keys.
_README.usage: In tests, use cy.getSelector('key.path'). For actions, pass the key path directly to action functions.
_README.maintenance: When the UI changes, update the selector here. Tests remain untouched as they consume the logical keys.
